scripts.ex:build:unix: cd ../examples && for d in */; do (cd "$d" && pnpm build && cd ..); done
scripts.ex:build:windows: cd ../examples && for /d %i in (*) do (cd %i && pnpm build && cd ..)
scripts.ex:clean:unix: rush purge && cd ../examples && for d in */; do (cd "$d" && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && cd ..); done
scripts.ex:clean:windows: rush purge && cd ../examples && for /d %i in (*) do (cd %i && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && cd ..)
scripts.ex:install:unix: cd ../examples && for d in */; do (cd "$d" && pnpm install && cd ..); done
scripts.ex:install:windows: cd ../examples && for /d %i in (*) do (cd %i && pnpm install && cd ..)
scripts.prepare: npm install serve -g && pnpm exec playwright install
